suggestions.title: Add a Simple Footer
suggestions.description: Add a basic footer to the application with copyright information and a link to the project's repository
suggestions.rationale: Provides users with essential information about the project and its creators

suggestions.title: Implement Basic Form Validation
suggestions.description: Add basic validation to the file upload form to ensure users enter required information and upload files in the correct format
suggestions.rationale: Improves user experience by preventing errors and ensuring data quality

suggestions.title: Display Simple Counters
suggestions.description: Display counters for the number of pitches, evaluations, and users on the dashboard
suggestions.rationale: Provides users with a quick overview of the project's activity and engagement

suggestions.title: Add Tooltips to UI Elements
suggestions.description: Add tooltips to explain the purpose of each UI element, such as buttons and icons
suggestions.rationale: Improves user experience by providing context and guidance on how to use the application

suggestions.title: Change Button Colors
suggestions.description: Update the button colors to match the project's branding and improve visual consistency
suggestions.rationale: Enhances the application's visual appeal and professionalism

latest_suggestions.project_analysis: The project is a pitch evaluation platform with a robust backend and a user-friendly frontend. The existing codebase provides a solid foundation for building upon and improving the user experience. The suggested features focus on practical and implementable improvements that add meaningful value to users.
